metadata.synopsis: Dammon comments on the corpse of the devilish ox.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Kill the devilish ox in Haven. After it dies, Dammon walks over to examine it, and comment on it.

1.speaker: Dammon
1.text: Just when I think I've seen it all...
1.context: NodeContext: Staring at the dead ochre jelly that was once one of the oxen in the stable.

0.speaker: Dammon
0.context: NodeContext: Resigned acceptance. At leas tthis weird thing is dead, unlike all the other threats to our safety.
